# install homebrew
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

# open zsh config
vim  ~/.zshrc

# disable autoupdate
export HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE=true
